thread.title: Chrissy Teigen and John Legend Make Glam Oscars Appearance, Show Sweet PDA on the Red Carpet: Pics!
thread.title_full: Chrissy Teigen and John Legend Make Glam Oscars Appearance, Show Sweet PDA on the Red Carpet: Pics!

author: Antoinette Bueno
title: Chrissy Teigen and John Legend Make Glam Oscars Appearance, Show Sweet PDA on the Red Carpet: Pics!
text: Chrissy Teigen and John Legend Make Glam Oscars Appearance, Show Sweet PDA on the Red Carpet: Pics! by Antoinette Bueno 4:42 PM PST, February 26, 2017 Photo: Getty Images Chrissy Teigen and John Legend are still giving us serious #relationshipgoals. The couple attended the 2017 Oscars on Sunday, where Teigen showed plenty of leg in a white Zuhair Murad dress featuring a daring thigh-high slit. As always, the 31-year-old supermodel and the 38-year-old singer looked like they were having the best time ever , adorably posing together on the red carpet. Photo: Getty Images PICS: See All the 2017 Oscars Red Carpet Arrivals! Photo: Getty Images Legend also snuck in a few sweet kisses on his wife's head. It's a big night for the La La Land star, as he's performing a medley of the film's Oscar-nominated songs, "City of Stars" and "Audition," during the ceremony. Photo: Getty Images Teigen, of course, documented her experience getting ready for the big night on Snapchat. She had plenty of fun getting her hair done with her good pal, celeb hairstylist Jen Atkin, and also adorably played with her daughter, Luna. Legend also made an appearance, with Teigen joking that he was "lit off water" as he danced in his suit. Photo: Snapchat Photo: Snapchat ET talked to Teigen earlier this month while she promoted her sexy Sports Illustrated photo shoot , when she candidly talked about finding time for date nights with her husband. Watch below:
